skills.label: Support the Microsoft Dynamics 365 client environment
items: Validate minimum browser requirements for devices utilizing the web interface to access microsoft dynamics 365, ensure client devices meet the minimum hardware specifications, support outlook integration by using outlook or outlook with dynamics 365 app for outlook installed, manage phone and tablet client environments

skills.label: Deploy Microsoft Dynamics
items: Determine the proper edition of microsoft dynamics 365 suited for the client
Determine the proper pricing, packaging, and subscription model based on the needs of the organizational environment
Create a deployment plan to meet organizational considerations

skills.label: Import data into the Microsoft Dynamics 365 environment
items: Design a data import plan, import data through supported methodologies, upload data from on-premises to azure, manage large volume migrations with the data loader service

skills.label: Manage the Microsoft Dynamics 365 environment
items: Sign-up and cancel subscriptions, manage users, configure sso and ad synchronization within hybrid environments with active directory federation services (adfs), configure administrative access, assign roles

skills.label: Deploy instances
items: Deploy appropriate number and types of instances for designated environments, deploy sandbox and production instances, configure and edit instance properties

skills.label: Manage instances
items: Switch an instance, reset an instance, delete an instance, copy an instance, manage regions and multiple tenant environments, manage storage and resources, manage administrative email notifications

skills.label: Manage updates
items: Design a microsoft dynamics 365 update policy

label: Integrate Microsoft Dynamics with Other Applications (20% - 25%)

skills.label: Integrate Microsoft Exchange, SharePoint, and OneDrive with Microsoft Dynamics
items: Configure exchange server synchronization for incoming and outgoing traffic, manage folder based tracking flows, manage sharepoint integration, enable onedrive for business, configure control access and folder structure for sharepoint

skills.label: Integrate other Microsoft Online Business Solutions with Microsoft Dynamics
items: Manage onenote integration, manage microsoft social engagement integration, manage yammer integration, manage workspace collaboration with office 365 groups, manage and configure delve integration

skills.label: Integrate customized and third party applications with Microsoft Dynamics
items: Configure and manage app modules, create customized function apps with app designer, create site maps by using design app mapper, obtain access to additional apps through app source and power apps

label: Manage Microsoft Outlook and Mobile Environments (25% - 30%)

skills.label: Integrate Microsoft Dynamics 365 with Outlook
items: Manage supported environments for microsoft dynamics 365 for outlook, deploy microsoft dynamics 365 for outlook through multiple methods, configure microsoft dynamics 365 for outlook to connect to multiple instances, configure synchronized fields, perform basic functions using the microsoft dynamics 365 app for outlook interface

skills.label: Manage and configure mobile apps for Microsoft Dynamics 365
items: Configure microsoft dynamics 365 for phones express and newer microsoft dynamics 365 for phones and tablets, configure entities and security privileges, manage crm forms and dashboards
